Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1981...
Traded from Cleveland to St. Louis on 1/31/1985 (Going to STL: 1B P. O'Neill. Going to CLE: RF F. Lynn, 2B J. McKnight)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/1988, off Dennis Lewallyn (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/16/1988, off Greg Maddux (HOU)...
Traded from St. Louis to Minnesota on 2/10/1989 (Going to STL: P C. Guante. Going to MIN: RF P. O'Neill)...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 5/25/1989...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1989, hitting .443 with 6 HR, 18 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York (A) on 7/24/1990...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1992, hitting .455 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1992, hitting .400 with 8 HR, 22 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Detroit on 5/15/1992...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 9/6/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1992, hitting .387 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 9/23/1992...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 9/28/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1992, hitting .357 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1992, hitting .333 with 11 HR, 33 RBI...
Traded from Minnesota to St. Louis on 5/5/1993 (Going to STL: 1B P. O'Neill, P A. Rincon. Going to MIN: RF J. Burnitz, P J. Shaw, P S. Takatsu, P P. Harnisch)...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1993, hitting .519 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Won World Series with St. Louis in 1993...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against New York (N) on 6/29/1995...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1995, hitting .352 with 8 HR, 28 RBI...
Was selected to the 1996 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Cincinnati on 7/20/1996...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1996, hitting .388 with 6 HR, 24 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Chicago (N) on 9/24/1996...
Won MVP Award in 1996, hitting .318 with 31 HR, 110 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 6/25/1997...
